blog_data.title: National Chiao Tung University Scholarships 2026: Your Fully Funded Guide
blog_data.excerpt: Dreaming of studying in Taiwan? The fully funded National Chiao Tung University (NYCU) Scholarship 2026 is your chance! Get details on stipends, tuition waivers, and how to apply.
blog_data.content:
Study in Taiwan's Tech Hub: Your Guide to the NYCU Scholarship 2026 (Fully Funded)

Have you ever dreamed of pursuing your degree at a world-class research university located in the heart of a technological powerhouse? Here's your chance. Applications are opening for the National Yang Ming Chiao Tung University (NYCU) Scholarship 2026, a fully funded opportunity for international students to study in Hsinchu, often called Taiwan's Silicon Valley.

This isn't just another scholarship; it's a gateway to innovation. NYCU is a prestigious institution born from the merger of two top universities, renowned for its cutting-edge programs in engineering, computer science, medicine, and more. If you're a high-achieving student ready for an exceptional educational journey in Asia, this guide will walk you through everything you need to know.

Why NYCU is a Top Choice for International Students

Choosing where to study is a huge decision, but NYCU makes a compelling case. The university is a hub for global talent, deeply integrated with the Hsinchu Science Park. This means you're not just in a classroom; you're at the epicenter of technological advancement. The university is celebrated for its:

  • Academic Excellence: NYCU is a leading research university with a strong focus on sustainable development, AI, biomedical sciences, and semiconductor technology.

  • Vibrant Community: Join a diverse and dynamic academic community of students and researchers from all over the globe.

  • Strategic Location: Live and study in Hsinchu, a city known for its innovation, offering unparalleled opportunities for research and industry collaboration.

What Does 'Fully Funded' Actually Mean? Financial Benefits Explained

The NYCU International Student Scholarship is designed to provide comprehensive financial support, allowing you to focus entirely on your studies. The benefits are generous and can be awarded either separately or simultaneously.

Monthly Living Stipends

A monthly stipend is provided to help cover your living expenses. The amount varies based on your degree level:

  • Undergraduate Students: NT$5,000 – NT$21,000 per month

  • Master’s Students: NT$7,000 – NT$25,000 per month

  • Ph.D. Students: NT$10,000 – NT$30,000 per month

Tuition & Fee Waivers

In addition to the stipend, the scholarship can cover your tuition. This may come as either:

  • A full waiver of tuition and credit fees.

  • A reduction in fees, charging you at the same rate as local Taiwanese students.

The Elite Ph.D. Scholarship

For exceptional new Ph.D. candidates, NYCU offers an even more attractive package. The Elite Ph.D. Scholarship includes a full tuition waiver and a monthly stipend of NT$33,000, co-funded by the university and your academic advisor.

Are You Eligible to Apply?

Before you get too excited, let's check the requirements. The scholarship is competitive, so make sure you meet the criteria:

  • Nationality: You must be an international student and not hold Taiwanese citizenship.

  • Academic Standing: You need a strong academic record. The minimum GPA requirements for renewal are typically a 3.0/4.0 for undergraduates and a 3.5/4.0 for graduate students.

  • No Double Dipping: You cannot be a recipient of other Taiwanese government-funded scholarships (e.g., Taiwan Scholarship, TIGP Scholarship) at the same time.

  • Enrollment Status: The scholarship is open to new and currently enrolled international students at NYCU pursuing Bachelor's, Master's, or Ph.D. degrees.

Wide Range of Academic Programs

NYCU offers a vast array of programs across numerous colleges. Whether you're in STEM or the humanities, there's likely a fit for you:

  • College of Engineering

  • College of Computer Science

  • College of Electrical and Computer Engineering

  • International College of Semiconductor Technology

  • College of Artificial Intelligence and Green Energy

  • College of Science

  • College of Biological Science and Technology

  • College of Management

  • College of Humanities and Social Sciences

  • School of Law

How to Apply for the NYCU Scholarship 2026

The application process is handled entirely online. It's crucial to be organized and submit everything before the deadline. Late applications won't be considered.

Key Application Steps

  1. Start Your Application: New students apply for the scholarship at the same time they apply for admission to NYCU through the university's online portal.
  2. Prepare Your Documents: Gather all the necessary paperwork. You'll need PDF versions to upload.
  3. Submit and Monitor: Submit your application before the deadline and check your email and the application portal regularly for any updates or requests for additional information.

Required Documents Checklist

  • Online Application Form

  • Passport Copy

  • Highest Degree Certificate & Transcripts: Officially verified.

  • Two Letters of Recommendation

  • Study Plan: A well-written plan in English or Chinese is critical.

  • Proof of English Proficiency: An IELTS/TOEFL score or an official letter from your previous university stating that your education was conducted in English.

  • Academic Thesis or Publications: Required for Ph.D. applicants.

Application Deadlines

NYCU has two main intakes per year. For the 2026 academic year, keep these typical timelines in mind:

  • Fall Intake: Applications usually close around March 15th.

  • Spring Intake: Applications usually close around September 15th of the preceding year.

Always double-check the official NYCU Office of International Affairs website for the exact dates, as they can be subject to change.

Taking the leap to study abroad is a big step, but an opportunity like the NYCU Scholarship 2026 makes it an achievable dream. With its world-class education and generous funding in one of the most innovative corners of the world, it’s an experience that could define your future. Start preparing your application and get ready for an incredible journey in Taiwan!
